tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: **** ****** **** We've got in the form of Dr. Ramya, she is very friendly and make sure patient feels comfortable throughout the smooth treatment. The moment we met first time we were frustrated with all previous worse experiences, Dr. Ramya took it very carefully and throughout the pregnancy until delivery and even post delivery she is guiding us in every part, she proofs the profession again and again that Doctors are living god in the earth, my heartiest blessings for Dr. Ramya and thanking her in words is not worthy, she has helped us to get the precious moment in our life which we were waiting eagerly,  Hat's off to Ramya Mam...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I want to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and support Dr Ramya K S provided throughout my pregnancy and delivery. Her expertise, patience, and reassuring demeanor made all the difference during such a critical time.

From our very first appointment, I knew I was in capable hands. The thorough explanations and willingness to address all my concerns eased any anxieties I had. I cannot thank enough for the professionalism and kindness Dr Ramya showed throughout the entire process.

Moreover, Your availability to answer questions and provide guidance has been invaluable as I navigate this new chapter of motherhood.

I feel truly fortunate to have had Dr Ramya as my gynecologist and obstetrician. Her commitment to her profession and patients is evident, and I will always remember the positive experience I had under her care.

Once again, thank you from the bottom of my heart for everything she has done for me and my family. I look forward to continuing to entrust my healthcare needs to her in the future.

I would suggest Dr. Ramya for any gynecological consultation and specifically pregnancy.

review:
I had some problem in my overy for which I had pain and I was bleeding so when I meet with doctor she clarified the problem for which I was suffering. She treated me and send for scanning their it was clear about my problem. She gave me some tablet and after that a flow up was their which was after 10 days of the treatment and my problem is 90% got cured just left with the rest 10% which right now I am going through. She is very clear *** ***** ************* doctor. She makes me understand my problem so properly that I had a clear vision of my problem. Her treatment was trustable and simple and quick curable. I recommend her to go for all kind of gynecological problems. 
I thanks her to be so helpful and friendly and made me come out of my problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I consulted with Dr. Ramya in my second month of pregnancy, seeking care for a complex situation. Being diabetic and facing challenges such as placenta previa and short cervical length later in the pregnancy made it a high-risk scenario. Dr. Ramya's expertise and compassionate approach were evident from the start. She meticulously assessed my condition, provided clear explanations, and devised a comprehensive care plan tailored to my specific needs. Throughout the journey, she demonstrated exceptional professionalism, offering reassurance and support during each visit. Thanks to Dr. Ramya's dedication and skill, I felt confident and well-cared-for during this challenging time. I am immensely grateful for her invaluable contribution to my pregnancy journey

review:
Hi,
I am delighted to write a review about Dr.Ramya K S Ma'am. I cannot just say Thanks , it has to be more than that.
I just want to say few important sentence about Dr.Ramya K S  ma'am ("The Hands are Magical" , "Elegance With great Brain" & "Positive attitude" ) 😊

All special thanks to Dr. Ramya K S from bottom of my heart for making our dream come true.

Dr Ramya K S is truly a blessing sent for us! I consulted her from the very first day of my pregnancy and delivered a healthy baby boy in October. It was only because of her constant guidance and motivation that encouraged me for a normal delivery. Apart from being the best in her field, she is the most humble person Ive come across. Ma’am was so patient with all our queries as first time parents and has guided me post delivery as well due to which my recovery has been extremely smooth. I highly recommend Dr Ramya K S to all who want to make the best of their pregnancy journey, you’d be in the safest hands possible .
Thankyou ma’am for giving us the most precious gift :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I used this app when I am  unable to go any hospital.   I was suffering from vomiting, fever, and  extreme body pain. same day i got to know that I am pregnant. then I was contact with gynecologist dr. Ramya she is very nice and excellent doctor. I told all the symptoms then doctor prescribed me some medicine and some folic acid tablet for baby. doctors told me that not to take  any medicine by yourself without consulting any doctor in pregnancy days. and i followed her. and i feel better after 2 days.. ya overall experience is good. I must say in these app doctors are good. and you can take advice or consultation over call if you are not unable to reached hospital at that time. thanks.
